MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L34 postcode area of Prescot, affecting properties in Park Road, Egerton Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:54PM. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 01:00AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:57PM on 4th April 2021
